text: 22:13 Josua 1:6-9Solomon, nɨ deravɨra uabɨ geghuv, egh Ikiavɨra Itir God Israelia e bagha Moses ganɨngizir arazir a ifongeziba, ko bizir a damuasa e mɨkemezibar gɨn mangɨtɨ, bizir nɨ damuamiba deravɨram otivam. Nɨ mɨtɨgh bar gavgavigh, egh atiatingan markɨ. Nɨ bizitam ateghtɨ, a nɨ damutɨ nɨ dɨgavir kuram damigh puram onganan markɨ.
